metadata.title: CVE-2019-13568 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: CImg through 2.6.7 has a heap-based buffer overflow in _load_bmp in CImg.hbecause of erroneous memory allocation for a malformed BMP image.

criterions.comment: cimg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
